algorithms.disjointSets

Class DisjointSetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.disjointSets.DisjointSetHelper

  • public class DisjointSetHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    a disjoint set implemented with doubly linked lists based upon pseudocode from "Introduction to Algorithms" by Cormen et al. Each set has a single representative which all members point to. This makes comparing whether two objects are in the same set fast by checking that their representatives are the same.
    Author:
    nichole
